args.natural_language_statement: In a metric space, S is open if and only if for every p in S there is an ε > 0 such that B(p,ε) ⊆ S. Translate to Lean4 and end the theorem with := by sorry. Use Mathlib import at top.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Set Filter TopologicalSpace Bornology
open scoped ENNReal NNReal Uniformity Topology
open Lean Meta Qq Function

/-- In a metric space, S is open if and only if for every p in S there is an ε > 0 such that B(p,ε) ⊆ S. Translate to Lean4 and end the theorem with := by sorry. Use Mathlib import at top. -/
theorem isOpen_iff_extracted [PseudoMetricSpace α] {s : Set α} : IsOpen s ↔ ∀ p ∈ s, ∃ ε > 0, ball p ε ⊆ s := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

theorem isOpen_iff_forall_exists_ball {α : Type _} [PseudoMetricSpace α] {s : Set α} :
  IsOpen s ↔ ∀ p ∈ s, ∃ ε > 0, Metric.ball p ε ⊆ s := by sorry
